bio: We are the largest learning ecosystem in Eastern Europe.
contributionDescription: We have a strong media presence. Here are links to videos and posts where we've talked about the Optimism ecosystem. We popularized your ecosystem among our audience, agitated users to do quests, use bridges, explore the ecosystem. In total, you've brought several thousand active users to you. And we have already made instructions on how to work with your ecosystem in our WEB resources
